title: 圖書館臨時休館通知Notice of Library Temporary Closure
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 圖書資訊處 - 周小萍 - hedy@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6852
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_休學學生_兼任教師_退休教職員_教職員眷屬
標題： 圖書館臨時休館通知Notice of Library Temporary Closure
日期： Sat, 2 Nov 2024 16:58:52 +0800

大家好，
因為水塔溢水造成圖書館電器室受損，目前圖書館全館失去電力，故今日(11/2)17時至22時無法開館閱覽，造成不便，敬請見諒。
明日(11/3)9時至17時將照常開館，惟電力不確定是否能恢復。若來不及於17時恢復電力，將再行公告晚間(17-22)閉館。
圖書資訊處敬啟
Due to damage to the electrical room caused by the overflow of water from the water tower, the entire library lost power, so we were unable to open the library from 17:00 to 22:00 today (11/2), we are sorry for the inconvenience.
The Library will be open from 9:00 to 17:00 tomorrow (11/3), but we are not sure if the power will be restored. If the power is not restored by 17:00, the library will be closed again in the evening (17-22).
